title: Requisition
description: A requisition to be handeled by a laboratory.

sampleId.description: The unique identifier for a sample. See SSDv2 D.01

sampleTakenDate.description: Date, UTC, when the sample was taken. RFC3339, YYYY-MM-DD

matrix.description: What it is sample off. E.g kidney, muscle etc

analyse.description: What it should be analysed for.

live.description: Was the animal alive at the time of sampling?

age.description: The age of the animal (in years) at the time of sampling.
age.$comment: Should weeks, months, days also be possible resolutions in age?

pregnant.description: Was the animal pregnant at the time of sampling?

parturition.description: Has the animal given birth within the last 4 weeks?

medicalTreatment.description: Documentation of medical treatment within the last 4 weeks.
